鐶字的基本解释

鐶
huán
见“镮”。

鐶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huán］
［《廣韻》户關切，平删，匣。］
“镮1”的繁体字。
(1)环。泛指圆圈形物。
(2)一串连环（链条）中的一节。
(3)铜钱。多用作钱币量词，表示价值很小。
(4)书法用语。

鐶字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鐶； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1324第01
【廣韻】戸關切【集韻】【正韻】胡關切，?音還。【廣韻】指鐶。【集韻】金鐶。【正字通】凡圜郭有孔，可貫繫者謂之鐶。【揚子·太?經】錘以玉鐶。　又【集韻】隨戀切，音㳬。車鐶也。本作鋗。

Yong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huán]
["Guangyun" household concern, flat deletion, box. ]
Traditional characters for "镮1".
(1) Ring. Refers to circle-shaped objects in general.
(2) A section in a series of links (chains).
(3) Copper coins. It is often used as a quantifier of money to indicate that the value is very small.
(4) Calligraphy terms.
Yong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　镮; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 1324 01
[Guang Yun] You are concerned [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Hu is concerned, the sound is still there. [Guang Yun] refers to the yong. 【Ji Yun】Golden 镮. 【Zhengzitong】Fanqiguo has holes, and those who can be connected are called 镮. 【Yangtze·Tai? Scripture】Hammer to jade piping.　[Jiyun] Cut with love, sound 㳬. The chariot is also. This is for Eun.
